markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 633 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the illusion school of magic, typically involving false sensory stimuli.
name: Illusion
